content: ***every wardrobe deserves a chunky cardigan create a layered look for fall and winter with the kima cardi *** the overall feel is comfy and cozy without being too heavy the cardigan is constructed in simple pieces then seamed together the thick neckline ribbing and deep pockets are the finishing touches styled with ripped jeans a pencil skirt or pajama pants you re always dressed for the occasion with a handmade cardigan **materials** -930-1685 yards bulky #5 weight wool/acrylic blend yarn see sizes for the breakdown by size -10mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry needle -locking stitch markers -tape measure **techniques** -back loop stitching -working into row ends -turned row -textured stitching -garment construction **sizes** all sizes are intended to have an oversized fit - 12-18 positive ease size down if you are in-between sizes photos show a model with a 35 bust in size xs/s xs/s intended for bust 28-34 930 yards m/l intended for bust 36-42 1160 yards xl/2xl intended for bust 44-50 1410 yards 3xl/4xl intended for bust 52-58 1685 yards find the free version of the kima cardi here 1 // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/kima-cardi-free-chunky-crochet-cardigan-pattern
